mapper.select: select h.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID, ( select e.ME_CKANJINAME from MAST_EMPLOYEES e where e.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = h.TPH_CCUSTOMERID and e.ME_CCOMPANYID = h.TPH_CCOMPANYID and e.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = h.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID and e.ME_DSTARTDATE = ( select max(ee.ME_DSTARTDATE) from MAST_EMPLOYEES ee where ee.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = e.ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK and ee.ME_CCOMPANYID = e.ME_CCOMPANYID and ee.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = e.ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK ) ) as name, ( select e.TEM_CWORKTYPEID from TMG_EMPLOYEES e where e.TEM_CCUSTOMERID = h.TPH_CCUSTOMERID and e.TEM_CCOMPANYID = h.TPH_CCOMPANYID and e.TEM_CEMPLOYEEID = h.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID and e.TEM_DSTARTDATE <= trunc(SYSDATE) and e.TEM_DENDDATE >= trunc(SYSDATE)) as workertypeid, ( select tmg_f_get_mgd(e.TEM_CWORKTYPEID, trunc(SYSDATE), h.TPH_CCUSTOMERID, h.TPH_CCOMPANYID, 'ja') from TMG_EMPLOYEES e where e.TEM_CCUSTOMERID = h.TPH_CCUSTOMERID and e.TEM_CCOMPANYID = h.TPH_CCOMPANYID and e.TEM_CEMPLOYEEID = h.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID and e.TEM_DSTARTDATE <= trunc(SYSDATE) and e.TEM_DENDDATE >= trunc(SYSDATE) ) as workertypenm, to_char(h.TPH_DYYYYMM, 'yyyy/mm') as TPH_DYYYYMM, to_char(h.TPH_DYYYYMMDD, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as TPH_DYYYYMMDD, a.SEQ, NVL(h.TPH_NINVEST, 0) + NVL(h.TPH_NADJUST, 0) as invest_days_sum, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(h.TPH_NADJUST_HOURS, 1) as invest_hours, NVL(h.TPH_NTHROUGHOUT, 0) + NVL(h.TPH_NADJUST_TO, 0) as throughout_days_sum, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI_WITH_MINUS(NVL(h.TPH_NTHROUGHOUT_HOURS, 0) + NVL(h.TPH_NADJUST_HOURS_TO, 0), 1) as throughout_hours_sum from TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY h, ( ${value} ) a where h.TPH_DYYYYMMDD = ( select max(h2.TPH_DYYYYMMDD) from TMG_PAID_HOLIDAY h2 where h2.TPH_CCUSTOMERID = h.TPH_CCUSTOMERID and h2.TPH_CCOMPANYID = h.TPH_CCOMPANYID and h2.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID = h.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID and h2.TPH_DYYYYMMDD <= trunc(SYSDATE) ) and a.EMPID = h.TPH_CEMPLOYEEID and a.CUST = h.TPH_CCUSTOMERID and a.COMP = h.TPH_CCOMPANYID order by a.SEQ

SELECT v.empid FROM (${empsql}) v
WHERE v.empid IN
#{item}
AND 'TMG_MANAGEFLG|0' <> TMG_F_IS_MANAGEFLG(v.empid, TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{yyyymmdd})), TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{yyyymmdd})), v.cust, v.comp)

SELECT PSEMPRELATION.FUNC_GET_RELATIONID_EX( '${psCust}', '${psLogin}', '${psTarget}', '${psSystem}', '${psDesig}', TO_DATE('${psDate}','yyyy/mm/dd'), ${psBase1}, ${psBase2}, ${psBase3}, ${psBase4}, ${psBase5}, ${psBase6}, ${psBase7}, ${psBase8} ) FROM DUAL
SELECT PSEMPRELATION.FUNC_GET_RELATIONID( '${psCust}', '${psLogin}', '${psTarget}', '${psSystem}', '${psDesig}', TO_DATE('${psDate}','yyyy/mm/dd')) FROM DUAL

-- ログイン制御 ログインアカウント情報取得SQL(基準日判定有り) SELECT DISTINCT HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK, HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, MAC_CLAYEREDCOMPANYID, MAC_NSEQ, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_COMP_NAME( MAC_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK, MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK, '${date}', '${language}' ) MAC_CCOMPANYNAME, HD_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, HD_CUSERID, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_EMP_NAME( ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK, ME_CCOMPANYID, ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, '${date}', '${language}' ) ME_CEMPLOYEENAME, ME_CKANANAME, HD_CSECTIONID_FK, MO_CLAYEREDSECTIONID, MO_NSEQ, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_SECTION_NAME( MO_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK, MO_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK, MO_CSECTIONID_CK, '${date}', '${language}' ) MO_CSECTIONNAME, HD_CPOSTID_FK, MAP_NWEIGHTAGE, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_POST_NAME( MAP_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK, MAP_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK, MAP_CPOSTID_CK, '${date}', '${language}' ) MAP_CPOSTNAME, HD_CIFKEYORADDITIONALROLE, HD_DSTARTDATE_CK, HD_CBOSSORNOT FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES, -- 基本情報テーブル HIST_DESIGNATION, -- 異動歴テーブル MAST_COMPANY, -- 法人ツリーマスタ MAST_ORGANISATION, -- 組織ツリーマスタ MAST_POST -- 役職マスタ WHERE ME_CUSERID = #{loginUser} AND ME_DSTARTDATE <= #{date} AND ME_DENDDATE >= #{date} AND HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND HD_CUSERID = ME_CUSERID AND HD_DSTARTDATE_CK <= #{date} AND HD_DENDDATE >= #{date} AND MAC_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK = HD_CCOMPANYID_CK AND MAC_DSTART <= #{date} AND MAC_DEND >= #{date} AND MAC_CLANGUAGE = 'ja' AND MO_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND MO_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = HD_CCOMPANYID_CK AND MO_CSECTIONID_CK = HD_CSECTIONID_FK AND MO_DSTART <= #{date} AND MO_DEND >= #{date} AND MO_CLANGUAGE = 'ja' AND MAP_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND MAP_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = HD_CCOMPANYID_CK AND MAP_CPOSTID_CK = HD_CPOSTID_FK AND MAP_DSTART <= #{date} AND MAP_DEND >= #{date} AND MAP_CLANGUAGE = 'ja' ORDER BY HD_CIFKEYORADDITIONALROLE
SELECT PSORGRELATION.FUNC_GET_RELATIONID( '${psCust}', '${loginUser}', '${targetComp}', '${targetSection}', '${systemId}', ${desig}, TO_DATE('${psDate}','yyyy/mm/dd') ) FROM DUAL

-- Version3CompatibleLogicImpl 所属長（役所コード取得の可否、仮想兼務適用の可否判定） 情報取得SQLファイル SELECT HD_CPOSTID_FK, ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, MAP_NWEIGHTAGE, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_POST_NAME( MAP_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK, MAP_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK, MAP_CPOSTID_CK, TO_DATE('${date}'), 'ja') AS MAP_CPOSTNAME, HD_DSTARTDATE_CK FROM HIST_DESIGNATION, MAST_EMPLOYEES, MAST_POST WHERE HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK = #{custId} AND HD_CCOMPANYID_CK = #{compId} AND HD_CSECTIONID_FK = #{deptId} AND
HD_CPOSTID_FK = #{postId} AND
HD_CPOSTID_FK = #{postId} AND HD_NOFFCIALORNOT = '0' AND
HD_NOFFCIALORNOT = '0' AND
HD_DSTARTDATE_CK <= TO_DATE(#{date}) AND HD_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE(#{date}) AND MAP_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND MAP_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = HD_CCOMPANYID_CK AND MAP_CPOSTID_CK = HD_CPOSTID_FK AND MAP_DSTART <= TO_DATE(#{date}) AND MAP_DEND >= TO_DATE(#{date}) AND MAP_CLANGUAGE = 'ja' AND ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND ME_CCOMPANYID = HD_CCOMPANYID_CK AND ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = HD_CEMPLOYEEID_CK AND ME_DSTARTDATE <= TO_DATE(#{date}) AND ME_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE(#{date}) AND (ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYEDID = '0' OR (ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYEDID = '1' AND ME_DDATEOFRETIREMENT >= TO_DATE(#{date}))) ORDER BY MAP_NWEIGHTAGE, HD_DSTARTDATE_CK, ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK

SELECT TO_CHAR( MIN( ME_DSTARTDATE ), 'yyyy/mm/dd' ) AS DSTART, TO_CHAR( ME_DDATEOFEMPLOYEMENT, 'yyyy/mm/dd' ) AS DDATEOFEMPLOYEMENT FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES WHERE ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = #{custId} AND ME_CCOMPANYID = #{compId} AND ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = #{empId} AND ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYEDID = '0' GROUP BY ME_DDATEOFEMPLOYEMENT ORDER BY MIN( ME_DSTARTDATE ) DESC

SELECT HD.HD_ID, HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, ME_CUSERID, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_EMP_NAME( ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK,ME_CUSERID,'${searchDate}','${language}' ) AS emp_name, ME_CKANANAME, HD.HD_CSECTIONID_FK,
PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_SECTION_NAME( HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK,HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, HD.HD_CSECTIONID_FK,'${searchDate}','${language}' ) AS section_Name,
PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_SECTION_NICK( HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK,HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, HD.HD_CSECTIONID_FK,'${searchDate}','${language}' ) AS section_Name,
HD.HD_CPOSTID_FK,
PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_POST_NAME( HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK,HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, HD.HD_CPOSTID_FK,'${searchDate}','${language}' ) AS post_name,
PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_POST_NICK( HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK,HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, HD.HD_CPOSTID_FK,'${searchDate}','${language}' ) AS post_name,
( SELECT MAP_NWEIGHTAGE FROM MAST_POST WHERE MAP_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND MAP_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK AND MAP_CPOSTID_CK = HD.HD_CPOSTID_FK AND MAP_CLANGUAGE = 'ja' AND MAP_DSTART <= #{searchDate} AND MAP_DEND >= #{searchDate} ) AS MAP_NWEIGHTAGE,
PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_COMP_NAME( HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK,HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, ${searchDate},'${language}' ${searchDate},'${language}' ) AS comp_name,
PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_COMP_NICK( HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK,HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK,'${searchDate}','${language}' ) AS comp_name,
PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_GENERICDETAIL_DESC( ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK,ME_CCOMPANYID,'QZAITAI|' || ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYEDID, '${searchDate}','${language}' ) AS ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYED_NAME, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_GENERICDETAIL_SPARE( HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK,HD.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK, 'QHONKEN|'||HD.HD_CIFKEYORADDITIONALROLE,'${searchDate}','${language}',1 ) AS HD_CIFKEYORADDITIONALROLE FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES, ${designation} HD WHERE HD.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK(+) = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND HD.HD_CUSERID(+) = ME_CUSERID AND HD.HD_DSTARTDATE_CK(+) <= #{searchDate} AND HD.HD_DENDDATE(+) >= #{searchDate} AND ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = '01' AND ME_DSTARTDATE <= #{searchDate} AND ME_DENDDATE >= #{searchDate}
AND (${sEmpInfoUserIDList})

SELECT DISTINCT ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK, ME_CCOMPANYID, ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK, main.ME_CUSERID, main.ME_DSTARTDATE, ME_CKANANAME, CASE WHEN ME_DSTARTDATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_EMP_NAME('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK,'2222/03/31','${language}') ELSE PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_EMP_NAME('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK,NULL,'${language}') END ME_CNAME ,ME_CMAIL ,ME_DDATEOFEMPLOYEMENT ,ME_DDATEOFRETIREMENT ,ME_ID ,MA_ID ,MA_CUSERID ,MA_CACCOUNT ,MA_DSTART ,MA_DEND ,MA_NRETRYCOUNTER ,MA_NPASSWORDLOCK ,MA_CADMINUSER ,MAST_ACCOUNT.VERSIONNO VERSIONNO FROM (MAST_ORGANISATION JOIN MAST_EMPLOYEES main ON MO_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND MO_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = ME_CCOMPANYID ) LEFT JOIN MAST_ACCOUNT ON ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = MA_CCUSTOMERID AND ME_CUSERID = MA_CUSERID ,(SELECT MIN(ME_DSTARTDATE) ,ME_CUSERID FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES WHERE TRUNC(ME_DENDDATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY ME_CUSERID) mindate WHERE MO_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = #{custId} AND MO_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = #{sectionCompanyId} AND (MO_CSECTIONID_CK = #{sectionId} OR MO_CLAYEREDSECTIONID LIKE '%,' || #{sectionId} || ',%') AND MO_CLANGUAGE = 'ja' AND TRUNC(MO_DEND) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYEDID = '0' AND main.ME_CUSERID IN ( SELECT HD_CUSERID FROM HIST_DESIGNATION WHERE TRUNC(HD_DENDDATE) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND HD_CCOMPANYID_CK = ME_CCOMPANYID AND HD_CEMPLOYEEID_CK = ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK AND HD_CSECTIONID_FK = MO_CSECTIONID_CK ) AND mindate."MIN(ME_DSTARTDATE)" = main.ME_DSTARTDATE AND mindate.ME_CUSERID = main.ME_CUSERID ORDER BY ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK

SELECT ME_CCOMPANYID as company_id, ME_CUSERID as user_id, ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK as employee_id, HD_CSECTIONID_FK as section_code, HD_CPOSTID_FK as post_code, ME_CKANANAME kana_name, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_EMP_NAME('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,ME_CEMPLOYEEID_CK,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') kanji_name, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_SECTION_NAME('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,HD_CSECTIONID_FK,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') section_name, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_SECTION_NICK('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,HD_CSECTIONID_FK,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') section_nick, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_POST_NAME('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,HD_CPOSTID_FK,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') post_name, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_POST_NICK('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,HD_CPOSTID_FK,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') post_nick, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_COMP_NAME('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') company_name, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_COMP_NICK('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') company_nick, ME_CMAIL as YOBI1VALUE, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_GENERICDETAIL_DESC('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,HJD_CJOBDESC,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') as yobi2_value, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_GENERICDETAIL_DESC('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,HJG_CGRADE,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') as yobi3_value, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_GENERICDETAIL_DESC('${custId}',ME_CCOMPANYID,ME_CTYPEOFEMPLOYMENT,TO_DATE('${baseDate}'),'${language}') as yobi4_value, ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYEDID as is_out FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES, HIST_DESIGNATION, HIST_JOBDESC, HIST_JOBGRADE WHERE ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = #{custId} AND ME_CUSERID = #{userId} AND ME_DSTARTDATE <= #{baseDate} AND ME_DENDDATE >= #{baseDate} AND HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK(+) = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND HD_CUSERID(+) = ME_CUSERID AND HD_DSTARTDATE_CK(+) <= #{baseDate} AND HD_DENDDATE(+) >= #{baseDate} AND HD_CIFKEYORADDITIONALROLE(+) = '0' AND HJD_CCUSTOMERID(+) = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND HJD_CUSERID(+) = ME_CUSERID AND HJD_DSTARTDATE(+) <= #{baseDate} AND HJD_DENDDATE(+) >= #{baseDate} AND HJG_CCUSTOMERID(+) = ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK AND HJG_CUSERID(+) = ME_CUSERID AND HJG_DSTARTDATE(+) <= #{baseDate} AND HJG_DENDDATE(+) >= #{baseDate}
